content.rendered:
mCHEZA Review.

 mCHEZA offers an array of matches and has been a fan favourite site for a number of years. There are a number of reasons that contribute to its’ preference by kenyan customers.

mCHEZA at a glance.

Ease of Use – 9/10

Features – 6/10

Easy Jackpot – 8/10

SMS Betting – 6/10

Summary.

mCHEZA is one of the leading betting sites in Kenya that is guaranteed to give you the ultimate betting experience.

OVERALL

7.3/10   

In-depth Review

This is one of the earliest betting sites in the country and it was started at least half a decade ago. At it’s inception, betting was mostly done via SMS. Over time however, people embraced their website and they never looked back. Today, mCheza is one of the biggest betting sites on the country and it is loved for a number of reasons.

On top of having mouth-watering bonus options, they also have an online betting platform that allows members to follow games as they take place and even place live bets. mCHEZA has a series of special invite bonuses that allow you to get bonuses from the first 3 bets placed by the person you referred

What you need to know about Odi Bets

Homepage.

Features

Registration

Simply send an SMS with the word CHEZA to 29888. You will then receive a confirmation message from the bet site.

Jackpot.

This betting site offers a jackpot composed of different bet options. These bet options include combo 1 X 2 and U/O, that is a combination of the final result 1X2 and if there will be more or less than 2.5 goals scored in the match.

A total of seven matches are out to be predicted on a daily basis and a cash prize of Ksh 1,000,000 stands to be won everyday. This amount increases as the days of the week go by and if by the end of theweek the jackpot is not won, then the total amount to be won reverts back to the original Ksh 1,000,000.

In the event that the jackpot is won, the money is shared amongst those who would have made accurate predictions. If only one person predicts accurately, then that person gets to walk away with the whole amount.

Betting sites with the best odds.

Sports You Can Bet On.

Soccer

Hockey

Football

Tennis

Basketball

Volleyball

American football

Snooker

Athletics

Badminton

Boxing

Handball

Darts

Chess

Rugby

Netball

Pros.

Live betting available

Variety of sports to bet on

Invite bonuses

Casino available

Virtual betting

Get more information about Mozzart Bet

Cons.

Deposit fee

Cash out unavailable

Minimal jackpot rewards

mCheza FAQ.

What is the mCheza lipa na mpesa paybill number?

Mcheza paybill number is as follows; 295525

What are mCheza’s customer care contacts?

Customer care Safaricom: +254 (0) 709 229 888 Airtel: +254 (0) 780 229 888.

How to Bet on mCheza via SMS.

If you wish to place a single bet, all you have to do is SMS the game ID together with your bet selection and bet amount to 29888. For multibets, you ought to SMS the game ID’s and betting selections and make sure they are separated by# then followed by the amount you wish to place to  29888.

How do I cancel bets on mcheza?

In order to cancel a bet, you will have to make sure you do so early enough. 10 minutes to the start of the game, no cancellation is allowed. It is important to note that cancellation can only take place via SMS. All you have to do is send cancel#BetId to 29888

How do I place bets on Mcheza website?

Placing bets on mCheza is so easy. All you have to do is go to their website and check out all their matches first. After looking through their games and selecting the games with the best odds you will now have them in one betslip. What you have to do here is quite straightforward. You only have to go through your betslip and ensure the games you have there are the ones you want to bet on. You then go to the bottom of your betslip and key in the amount of money you wish to stake.
